Description: The ProWritingAid Lifetime Subscription Bundle includes an app that gives you stylistic advice
Title: Improve your writing with this award winning productivity software package
Author: httpsabout editors stack commerce

Description: China on Monday defended a plan to build a university in Hungary, saying critics who protested against it in Budapest over the weekend shouldn't politicize
Title: China defends Hungary university plan following protest
Author: Associated Press

Description: An organization that has defended the First Amendment rights of Nazis and the Ku Klux Klan is split by an internal debate over whether supporting progressive causes is more important
Title: Once a Bastion of Free Speech, the A C L U Faces an Identity Crisis
Author: Michael Powell

Description: Language models like GPT 3 can write poetry, but they often amplify negative stereotypes Researchers are trying different approaches to address the problem
Title: The Efforts to Make Text Based AI Less Racist and Terrible
Author: Khari Johnson

Description: As they got to know each other better, Emily Capilouto and Dr James Harb realized they had more similarities than differences
Title: Their Essential Interest in Common Was Each Other
Author: Nina Reyes
